task.ja: 「Finderについて」を開いてください。

pre_command: open /Users/ec2-user/Desktop; osascript -e 'tell application "Finder" to close windows' && rm -rf /Users/ec2-user/Documents/benchmark_files/ && cp -r /Users/ec2-user/Benchmark_Backup/benchmark_files /Users/ec2-user/Documents && osascript -e 'tell application "Finder" to activate'
grading_command: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "About Finder" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "关于访达" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "حول فايندر" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "Finderについて" && echo "True" || echo "False"

osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to get value of attribute "AXTitle" of window 1 of (first application process whose frontmost is true)' 2>/dev/null | grep -q "О приложении Finder" && echo "True" || echo "False"
